NAME

mime_hack - test the "attach to singlepart" hack

SYNOPSIS

Usage: 

    mime_hack /path/to/some.gif

DESCRIPTION

Encode a multipart message by starting with a text message, and attaching a GIF file to it.

AUTHOR

Eryq, eryq@zeegee.com
